person.persName: Mordecai Levi (Louisville, Kentucky, blacksmith and horse trader)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, blacksmith and horse trader. Kentucky native. Married to Rebecca Conrad Levi in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on January 23, 1845. Father of Thomas Levi. Blacksmith in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned three enslaved persons in Louisville in 1850. Horse trader in Louisville in 1858. Horse trader in Louisville in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Louisville in 1860. Horse trader in Louisville in 1861. Horse trader in Louisville in 1865.
